snippet.title: FEE3 2022: Fire Emblem Sealed Hope by HunterAurzo
snippet.description:
FE Sealed Hope is a (planned) 20 chapter hack (with planned post-game content) that involves Llyr, who takes leadership of the Cipher Mercenaries and works with his best friend, and king of Jrablibe, Mao, in order to stop the war that the country of Kreolt has declared. On the way, he learns more about himself, the world of Attendess, and his relationship with his friends.
Things that are unique for this hack:
-Unbreakable weapons, but the cost of them are increased (Similar to Fates/Echoes)
-Fast supports that is encouraged with stat boosters as rewards (Similar to New Mystery)
-Knights have movement skills so they can keep up
-Non-Infantry classes only use one weapon, while promoted Infantry classes can use two.
-Steve is a Magnificent Soldier
